steps.name: Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/
Disable cookies
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Recip-OUacY@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Recip-OUacY
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Verify that the email message is correct
Verify that the recipient's first name in the email is AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Recip-OUacY
Verify that the recipient's last name in the email is 47455
Verify that the custom msg in the email is obPhVurxVU
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Send-OUacY
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/organization/invite?token=b523fe9a2c30a26a9eb78b8f6403fa2a864cbf80ua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Send-OUacY 02875
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Send-OUacY
Click "Accept"
Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Send-OUacY 02875
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-zLPES-750-U-Recip-OUacY 47455
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
